hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); if echo "$INPUT" | grep -qE "\.env|\.env\.local|\.env\.development|\.env\.production"; then echo "BLOCKED: Do not edit .env files - they contain secrets (MONGO_URI, JWT_SECRET, Stripe keys)" >&2; exit 2; fi'
bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); if echo "$INPUT" | grep -qE "package-lock\.json"; then echo "BLOCKED: Do not edit package-lock.json directly - use npm install instead" >&2; exit 2; fi'
